title: WhatsApp Business working on subscription plan with up to 10 linked devices
content:
After announcing Reactions, Communities, group polls, and more, WhatsApp is now working on a subscription plan for its business app. With that, the company will bring exclusive features for those who rely on WhatsApp to work.

more…

The post WhatsApp Business working on subscription plan with up to 10 linked devices appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: According to WABetaInfo, WhatsApp Business will bring exclusive features for those who rely on WhatsApp to work. Here’s what we know.
